moves.name: Bide
moves.description: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.

moves.name: Meditate
moves.description: The user meditates to awaken the power deep within its body and raise its Attack stat.

moves.name: Confusion
moves.description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the target confused.

moves.name: Detect
moves.description: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Hidden Power
moves.description: A unique attack that varies in type depending on the Pokémon using it.

moves.name: Mind Reader
moves.description: The user senses the target's movements with its mind to ensure its next attack does not miss the target.

moves.name: Feint
moves.description: An attack that hits a target using Protect or Detect. It also lifts the effects of those moves.

moves.name: Calm Mind
moves.description: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: Force Palm
moves.description: The target is attacked with a shock wave. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: High Jump Kick
moves.description: The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If it misses, the user is hurt instead.

moves.name: Psych Up
moves.description: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the target.

moves.name: Acupressure
moves.description: The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply boosting one of its stats.

moves.name: Power Trick
moves.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack with its Defense stat.

moves.name: Reversal
moves.description: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

moves.name: Recover
moves.description: Restoring its own cells, the user restores its own HP by half of its max HP.
